metadata.title: CVE-2024-40932 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/exynos/vidi: fix memory leak in .get_modes()The duplicated EDID is never freed. Fix it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
